Description: Title:Responsible for the administration, design, selection, modification, and training related to engineering applications required for project delivery. Interacts with end users to resolve engineering design issues and limitations, provide solutions, and coordinate with applications development to design system enhancements necessary for project delivery. May also be responsible for evaluation of project requirements and system capabilities to provide solutions and feedback regarding feasibility and cost of engineering project requirements. This is the first level with supervisory responsibilities. Responsible for independently applying advanced development techniques, analyses, and methods. Will provide technical guidance to other engineering systems development personnel. Work assignments will be complex and longer term. Manages schedules, costs, and other documentation for small teams to accomplish projects on a timely basis within budget constraints. Will function in leadership role on a project team to address a specific assignment in firm. The skills for this position are typically acquired through the completion of a Bachelor's degree and 9+ years of experience, with average experience of 10+ years.Job Details
